title: Philippines Confirms 2 New Mpox Cases, Says They Are "Milder Variant"
content: The Philippines has confirmed two more mpox virus infections of the milder clade 2 variety, its health ministry said Monday, bringing the number of active cases to three.
summary: The Philippines has confirmed two more mpox virus infections of the milder clade 2 variety, its health ministry said Monday, bringing the number of active cases to three.

title: What UK's 102-Year-Old Skydiver Said After Jumping From 7,000 Feet
content: A 102-year-old woman in Britain opted for a unique birthday celebration this year. On August 25, Manette Baillie, who was once married to a paratrooper and served in the Women's Royal Naval Service during World War II, skydived out of a plane.
summary: A 102-year-old woman in Britain opted for a unique birthday celebration this year. On August 25, Manette Baillie, who was once married to a paratrooper and served in the Women's Royal Naval Service during World War II, skydived out of a plane.

title: Prince Harry Is "An Angry Boy, Desperately Misses UK," Says His Friend
content: Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle have been in the United States for over four years, but looks like the Duke of Sussex is still struggling to make it his new home.
summary: Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle have been in the United States for over four years, but looks like the Duke of Sussex is still struggling to make it his new home.

title: Ballistic Missiles Deployed By Kim Jong Un Target Seoul, Range 110km
content: Ballistic missile launchers that North Korea has said it plans to deploy on the border with South Korea are believed to have a range of 110 km (68 miles), allowing them to target Chungcheong Province south of Seoul, the Yonhap news agency reported.
summary: Ballistic missile launchers that North Korea has said it plans to deploy on the border with South Korea are believed to have a range of 110 km (68 miles), allowing them to target Chungcheong Province south of Seoul, the Yonhap news agency reported.

title: Viruses Can Work Against Antibiotic-Resistant Bacteria, New Research Shows
content: As the globe faces a rise in antibiotic-resistant bacteria making traditional antibiotics ineffective specific viruses could offer a solution.
summary: As the globe faces a rise in antibiotic-resistant bacteria making traditional antibiotics ineffective specific viruses could offer a solution.

title: Groom, His Cousin Killed In New York Car Crash One Day Before Wedding
content: The groom and his cousin were celebrating his bachelor party when their car was hit head-on by a pickup truck travelling in the wrong direction.
summary: The groom and his cousin were celebrating his bachelor party when their car was hit head-on by a pickup truck travelling in the wrong direction.

title: Lenovo Worker Fired For Urinating In Hotel Lobby, Sues For $1.5 Million
content: A Lenovo computer salesman has found himself in a swirl of trouble, fired from his job after he says a bladder condition forced him to relieve himself in a lobby of his Times Square hotel.
summary: A Lenovo computer salesman has found himself in a swirl of trouble, fired from his job after he says a bladder condition forced him to relieve himself in a lobby of his Times Square hotel.

title: Prince Harry Has Found A New "Father Figure" In US. He Is A Music Mogul
content: Prince Harry has found a new mentor and "father figure" in Canadian music icon David Foster, according to sources close to the pair, The Times reported.
summary: Prince Harry has found a new mentor and "father figure" in Canadian music icon David Foster, according to sources close to the pair, The Times reported.

title: Multiple Explosions In Kyiv As Russia Launches Drones, Missiles
content: At least seven explosions rang out on Monday morning over the Ukrainian capital Kyiv, AFP journalists heard, amid a nationwide alert warning against Russian aerial attacks.
summary: At least seven explosions rang out on Monday morning over the Ukrainian capital Kyiv, AFP journalists heard, amid a nationwide alert warning against Russian aerial attacks.

title: Mysterious Life Of Telegram CEO Pavel Durov, Called "Russian Zuckerberg"
content: Russian-born tech entrepreneur Pavel Durov has founded wildly popular social networks as well as a cryptocurrency, amassed a multi-billion-dollar fortune and locked horns with authorities not just in Russia but around the world.
summary: Russian-born tech entrepreneur Pavel Durov has founded wildly popular social networks as well as a cryptocurrency, amassed a multi-billion-dollar fortune and locked horns with authorities not just in Russia but around the world.

title: Russia Launches Drones, Missiles Towards Kyiv In Massive Air Attack
content: The sound of explosions rang out in central Kyiv on Monday morning during rush hour as Ukraine's military warned of a massive Russian missile and drone attack following waves of drone attacks in the early hours.
summary: The sound of explosions rang out in central Kyiv on Monday morning during rush hour as Ukraine's military warned of a massive Russian missile and drone attack following waves of drone attacks in the early hours.

title: 2 Bangladesh Diplomats In India Suspended By Muhammad Yunus Government
content: Two Bangladeshi diplomats serving in India were dismissed from their duties following an order from the interim government of Bangladesh.
summary: Two Bangladeshi diplomats serving in India were dismissed from their duties following an order from the interim government of Bangladesh.

title: 22 Killed In Pakistan After Gunmen Stop Vehicles, Start Shooting
content: Gunmen shot and killed at least 22 people in southwest Pakistan on Monday, after forcing them out of vehicles and checking their ethnicity, government officials said.
summary: Gunmen shot and killed at least 22 people in southwest Pakistan on Monday, after forcing them out of vehicles and checking their ethnicity, government officials said.

title: Elon Musk "Wouldn't Have Time For Cabinet, But Can Consult": Donald Trump
content: Former US President Donald Trump said that he would like to keep Tesla CEO Elon Musk in his cabinet if he's elected as President.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump said that he would like to keep Tesla CEO Elon Musk in his cabinet if he's elected as President.

title: He Has "Nothing To Hide": Telegram On Its CEO Pavel Durov's Arrest
content: Encrypted messaging app Telegram on Monday said that its CEO Pavel Durov  who was arrested in France  has nothing to hide and "it is absurd to claim that a platform or its owner are responsible for abuse of that platform."
summary: Encrypted messaging app Telegram on Monday said that its CEO Pavel Durov  who was arrested in France  has nothing to hide and "it is absurd to claim that a platform or its owner are responsible for abuse of that platform."

title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un Unveils New Suicide Drones After Performance Test
content: North Korea has unveiled a new "suicide drone", state media said Monday, with leader Kim Jong Un overseeing a performance test of the weapons, which experts said could have come from Russia.
summary: North Korea has unveiled a new "suicide drone", state media said Monday, with leader Kim Jong Un overseeing a performance test of the weapons, which experts said could have come from Russia.

title: Media Groups Urge EU To Sanction Israel For Death Of Journalists In Gaza
content: Some 60 media and rights organisations on Monday urged the European Union to suspend a cooperation accord with Israel and impose sanctions, accusing it of "massacring journalists" in Gaza.
summary: Some 60 media and rights organisations on Monday urged the European Union to suspend a cooperation accord with Israel and impose sanctions, accusing it of "massacring journalists" in Gaza.

title: Several Injured After Fresh Clashes Erupt In Dhaka Amid Political Turmoil
content: Violent clashes erupted between students and Ansar members near the Secretariat in Bangladesh's capital Dhaka on Sunday night. The confrontation left several people from both sides injured, the Dhaka Tribune reported.
summary: Violent clashes erupted between students and Ansar members near the Secretariat in Bangladesh's capital Dhaka on Sunday night. The confrontation left several people from both sides injured, the Dhaka Tribune reported.

title: Mid-Air Refuel, Precision Strikes: How Israeli Air Force Hit Hezbollah
content: The Israeli Air Force (IAF) on Sunday conducted a series of precision strikes on Hezbollah targets in Lebanon, thwarting what Israeli officials described as a large-scale attack.
summary: The Israeli Air Force (IAF) on Sunday conducted a series of precision strikes on Hezbollah targets in Lebanon, thwarting what Israeli officials described as a large-scale attack.

title: Why Londoners Are Buying Houses Miles Away From The Capital
content: More and more Londoners are purchasing homes further away from the capital in a bid to get a better bang for their buck.
summary: More and more Londoners are purchasing homes further away from the capital in a bid to get a better bang for their buck.
